notes.violation_threshold: Minimum cosine similarity to the combined violation centroid for a message to be considered a violation at all. Below this = compliant.
notes.severity_gap_threshold: Minimum gap between top and second centroid similarity to auto-decide severity. Below this gap = ambiguous = Layer 2.
notes.boundary_margin: If top two centroid similarities are within this margin AND adjacent severity levels = sitting on boundary = Layer 2.
